data.comment: The match has started at Renato Dall'Ara.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari's Marko Rog misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 3, Michael Fabbri blows against Bologna's Musa Barrow for offside.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, Cagliari's Joao Pedro gets in a shot on goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 8, Bologna's Musa Barrow is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodrigo Palacio (Bologna) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Mattias Svanberg of Bologna gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
At Renato Dall'Ara, Cagliari are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 13, Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
In the minute 15, Cagliari take a 0-1 lead thanks to Joao Pedro.
Great play from Riccardo Sottil to set up the goal.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick Bologna.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Riccardo Orsolini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
In the minute 19, Michael Fabbri awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Babis Lykogiannis (Cagliari) has received a yellow card from Michael Fabbri.
In the minute 22, Bologna needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Bologna drive upfield and Musa Barrow gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Cagliari.
Michael Fabbri awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Mattias Svanberg fires in a strike for Bologna.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
Michael Fabbri awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Bologna's Riccardo Orsolini has run offside.
Michael Fabbri signals a Bologna throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Bologna drives forward and Mattias Svanberg gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 31, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Lorenzo De Silvestri (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 32, In Bologna, Roberto Soriano (Bologna) misses the target with a header.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Bologna.
Bologna's Riccardo Orsolini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
In the minute 34, Bologna push forward at Renato Dall'Ara and Roberto Soriano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 35, Rodrigo Palacio of Bologna smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Joao Pedro (Cagliari) has received a first yellow card.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Danilo is booked for the home team.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
In the minute 39, Bologna are coming forward and Danilo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Michael Fabbri awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Cagliari's Alessio Cragno has been booked in Bologna.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Cagliari's area.
In the minute 43, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Michael Fabbri signals a Cagliari throw-in in Bologna's half.
The first-half has come to a close in Bologna.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Musa Barrow.
Roberto Soriano instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Bologna pushes forward through Mattias Svanberg, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Giovanni Simeone.
In the minute 47, Gabriele Zappa with an assist there.
Cagliari are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cagliari have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 49, Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Nahitan Nandez for the away team is judged to be offside.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bologna.
Roberto Soriano is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Riccardo Orsolini instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 54, Michael Fabbri awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Bologna.
Musa Barrow scores to make it 3-2 at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 56, That's a fine assist from Mattias Svanberg.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 59, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Bologna's Musa Barrow gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Cagliari at Renato Dall'Ara.
Bologna's Aaron Hickey breaks free at Renato Dall'Ara. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Bologna in the half of Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Adam Ounas is replacing Riccardo Sottil for Cagliari at Renato Dall'Ara.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bologna.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 65, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Renato Dall'Ara, Lorenzo De Silvestri has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Lorenzo De Silvestri (Bologna) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 67, Musa Barrow for Bologna drives towards goal at Renato Dall'Ara. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Bologna a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Jerdy Schouten for Bologna has been booked by Michael Fabbri and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 70, Eusebio Di Francesco (Cagliari) is making a second substitution, with Paolo Farago replacing Gabriele Zappa.
The away team have replaced Giovanni Simeone with Leonardo Pavoletti. This is the third substitution made today by Eusebio Di Francesco.
In Bologna, Leonardo Pavoletti of Cagliari is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Michael Fabbri.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Danilo is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 73, Cagliari are pushing forward but Leonardo Pavoletti's finish is wide of the goal.
Michael Fabbri awards Bologna a goal kick.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 76, Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Bolognaâ€™s Danilo is on his feet again at Renato Dall'Ara.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Bologna.
In Bologna Cagliari drive forward through Adam Ounas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari's Joao Pedro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bologna defender.
In the minute 82, Michael Fabbri signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Bologna's area.
Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's first substitution at Renato Dall'Ara with Nicolas Dominguez replacing Mattias Svanberg.
The home team replace Rodrigo Palacio with Stefano Denswil.
In the minute 84, Free kick in a good position for Bologna!
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bologna close to the penalty box.
Cagliari make their fourth substitution with Alberto Cerri replacing Razvan Marin.
In the minute 86, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Musa Barrow for Bologna who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Bologna's Riccardo Orsolini misses with an attempt on goal.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Musa Barrow returns to the field for Bologna after picking up a slight injury.
Goal kick for Bologna at Renato Dall'Ara.
In the minute 89, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Emanuel Vignato (Bologna) has replaced the possibly injured Musa Barrow at Renato Dall'Ara.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Fabbri signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Michael Fabbri will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
